TopicTitle: Crash while loading asset bundle definition

Articles.Content:
Hi,

KSP keeps crashing for me during start-up, always at Loading Asset Bundle Definitions. Only error I get is "Kerbal Space Program - Unity 2019.2.2f1_ab112815d860". I made sure I have latest drivers, removed the game completely and re-installed, verified files integrity. I have no mods.

Any thoughts please?

========== OUTPUTTING STACK TRACE ==================

0x00007FFD201D4676 (dxgi) DXGIReportAdapterConfiguration
  ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 000000006F958438)
0x000000006F958438 (fraps64) (function-name not available)
0x00007FFCB24C49CA (UnityPlayer) PAL_Thread_SupportsThreads
0x00007FFCB2553325 (UnityPlayer) PAL_Thread_SupportsThreads
0x00007FFCB25586AB (UnityPlayer) PAL_Thread_SupportsThreads
0x00007FFCB2558788 (UnityPlayer) PAL_Thread_SupportsThreads
0x00007FFCB285A298 (UnityPlayer) UnityMain
0x00007FFD24A67BD4 (KERNEL32) BaseThreadInitThunk
0x00007FFD2500CE51 (ntdll) RtlUserThreadStart

========== END OF STACKTRACE ===========

Turns out Fraps was causing the crash for some reason. Quitting fraps makes KSP load every time just fine.

Check the sticky post on how to find logs and other data.

We all try to be very helpful here but sadly we are a bit short on mind readers or people that stalk all other players configs

Edit:

Mine has worked nice with fraps, and works nice with OBS.

 

Edited June 13, 2020 by Curveball Anders
